articles.author: Arden Dier
articles.title: Millions of Americans Have Undiagnosed Liver Disease - Newser
articles.description: 82% of people with most aggressive form of fatty liver disease have no idea: study
articles.content: Some 17 million people across the US, UK, Germany, and France are living with the most aggressive form of fatty liver disease and have no idea, a new study suggests. Metabolic dysfunction-associated … [+1648 chars]
